stix:STIX_Header.stix:Title: Unique Plugx Malware Variant Communicates Using Unique HTTP POST Requests
stix:STIX_Header.stix:Description:
On or around 15 April 2015, a U.S. Government Agency reported a unique malware variant that communicates over HTTP POST requests using custom x-headers that contain the letters "LZ". The malware implant communicates over ports 80 and 443. These command and control (C2) domains for the PlugX "LZ" variant were used from March to April of 2015. It has yet to be determined how initial access was gained to the C2 infrastructure.
Web servers are considered at the greatest risk to this malware due to their public accessibility.

stix:Indicator.indicator:Description:
This mitigation technique below should be customized to each individual environment but provides basic SNORT rule structure as a base for the PlugX "LZ" variant's communications:
----------Begin SNORT Signature---------- alert tcp any any -> any [80,443] (msg:"PLUGX malware variant beacon"; content:"POST"; http_method; content:"|0d 0a|LZ-ID|3a 20|"; content:"|0d 0a|LZVer| 3a 20|"; content:"|0d 0a|LZ-Compress|3a 20|"; content:"|0d 0a|LZ-Size|3a 20|"; content:"|0d 0a|Host|3a 20|"; sid: 1; rev: 1;) ---------End SNORT Signature-------------

The following HTTP POST request is unique to this "LZ" variant:
POST /C115FA70B3348649BD2FCF9F HTTP/1.1 Accept: */* LZ-ID: 0 LZ-Ver: 0 LZ-Compress: 61456 LZ-Size: 1 User-Agent: Mozilla/4.0 (compatible; MSIE 8.0; Windows NT 5.2; .NET CLR 1.1.4322; .NET CLR 2.0.50727; .NET CLR 3.0.04506.30; .NET CLR 3.0.04506.648; .NET CLR 3.5.21022; .NET CLR 3.0.4506.2152; .NET CLR 3.5.30729; .NET4.0C; .NET4.0E) Host: U.S. IP Address #1 Content-Length: 0 Connection: Keep-Alive Cache-Control: no-cache

The following HTTP POST request is unique to this "LZ" variant:
POST /C115FA70B3348649BD2FCF9F HTTP/1.1 Accept: */* LZ-ID: 0 LZ-Ver: 0 LZ-Compress: 61456 LZ-Size: 1 User-Agent: Mozilla/4.0 (compatible; MSIE 8.0; Windows NT 5.2; .NET CLR 1.1.4322; .NET CLR 2.0.50727; .NET CLR 3.0.04506.30; .NET CLR 3.0.04506.648; .NET CLR 3.5.21022; .NET CLR 3.0.4506.2152; .NET CLR 3.5.30729; .NET4.0C; .NET4.0E) Host: U.S. IP Address #1 Content-Length: 0 Connection: Keep-Alive Cache-Control: no-cache
